thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com | 6 of 1371
thread.title: Erica

author: Erica
title: Erica
text: I love pure formulas! The name says it all, they don't sell any brands that are bad for you chemically. Very, very fast shipping even with the 5-7 day free shipping option. I usually receive my packages within 2 days of purchase, not including Sundays or holidays. I haven't had to be in contact with customer service for anything, but I'm sure if I ever had to, they'd be quick to respond. They always have great deals going on, and great prices constantly. If you buy from GNC, stop. You can get the same things from pure formulas way cheaper. I'm so happy I discovered their site!!
